TopicTitle: Do Not Taunt the Magic Boulder!

Articles.Content: Do not ignore the magic boulder it likes the attention and will chase you down for it

**Edited <time datetime="2020-05-21T01:38:05Z" title="05/21/2020 01:38  AM" data-short="4 yr">May 21, 2020</time> by Lewie**

You ought not to remove the Magic Boulder from it's natural habitat, lest you end up with a thread similar to [@Just Jim](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/148725-just-jim/)'s *Emiko Station*.

Actually, that's a great idea.
